summary: This bill, the Justice for America’s Veterans and Survivors Act of 2025, mandates the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit an annual report to the House and Senate Veterans' Affairs Committees. This report will detail causes of death among veterans, including whether the veteran had a service-connected disability, the primary and secondary causes of death, and whether a veteran died by suicide related to a service-connected disability. The report also requires the total number of veterans who died from each identified primary cause.
